title: cisco women internship sem4
content: did anyone get a mail regarding the cisco internship interview round?

comments.body: Nope not yet, atp idek if they remember that they took the test
Please update here if anybody gets the results
Ig the interview round is over and simultaneously they have declared the results
Ig the interview round is over and simultaneously they have declared the results

In my clg they made a separate group for students selected in oa round. Their interviews were scheduled and some of them were asked to leave the grp(implying they were rejected). As of now idk whether final selections have been made or not.
any idea when will the interview results come out? like when we will get offer letter and how many people will get it? like around 80 people gave the HR round
